multiple-choice.question:
Let $n \geq 8$ be an integer. Consider a uniformly random permutation $a_1,a_2,...,a_n$ of the set $\{1,2,...,n\}$. Consider the events
[defs] A = "$a_7$ is the minimum of $a_1,a_2,...,a_7$", B = "$a_6$ is the minimum of $a_1,a_2,...,a_6$". [/defs]
Which of the following is correct?
multiple-choice.answer: The events $A$ and $B$ are not independent.
